responses: It seems that you are suffering from the common cold.

patterns: What medicines should I take for the common cold?
What are the recommended medicines for the common cold?
Which medicines can help with the common cold?
responses: For the common cold, you can take Dextromethorphan, Decongestant, Diphenhydramine, Crocin Cold & Flu Max.

patterns: What medicines should I take for fever?
What are the recommended medicines for fever?
Which medicines can help with fever?
responses: For fever, you can take Acetaminophen, Ibuprofen, Aspirin, Crocin Cold & Flu Max.

patterns: What medicines should I take for diabetes?
What are the recommended medicines for diabetes?
Which medicines can help with diabetes?
responses: For diabetes, you can take Insulin, Amylinomimetic drug, Dipeptidyl peptidase-4 (DPP-4) inhibitor.

patterns: What medicines should I take for depression?
What are the recommended medicines for depression?
Which medicines can help with depression?
responses: For depression, you can take Brexpiprazole, Quetiapine, Olanzapine.

patterns: What medicines should I take for asthma?
What are the recommended medicines for asthma?
Which medicines can help with asthma?
responses: For asthma, you can take Epinephrine, Anticholinergic, Proair HFA.

patterns: Who should I contact for consultation?
Can you give me some suggestions for doctor consultations?
Can you set up a meeting with a doctor for consultation?
Is there any doctor available for consultation?
responses: You can contact various doctors for consultation: 1. [1mg Online Doctor Consultation](https://www.1mg.com/online-doctor-consultation), 2. [Tata Health General Physician Consultation](https://www.tatahealth.com/online-doctor-consultation/general-physician), 3. [DocOnline](https://www.doconline.com/). Alternatively, you can visit your local doctor or family physician.
